lead_paragraph: Two former sheriff’s deputies were acquitted of involuntary manslaughter but convicted of lesser charges in the death of a detainee at the Chatham County jail.

headline.main: Georgia: Verdicts in Jail Inmate’s Death
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Verdicts In Jail Inmate’s Death

snippet: Two former sheriff’s deputies were acquitted of involuntary manslaughter but convicted of lesser charges in the death of a detainee at the Chatham County jail.
